additional_info:
1. Enable the style
2. Right click other streams and choose "picture on picture" to pop the video out
3. Press "F" to fullscreen the first screen.

Notes:
- Swap between streams will break the layout. This is impossible to fix unless the site updates / with other user-script to fix the behavior.
